product_name: Haiku Modern Flower Sling Bag - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Sporting a bold pattern, the women's Haiku Modern Flower Sling Bag can be slung over either shoulder while keeping your hands free as you shop or travel. The eco-friendly shoulder sling bag is made completely of recycled PET and measures 18 x 7 x 2 in. Roomy main compartment zips closed for security; front flap pocket snaps closed. Haiku Modern Flower Sling Bag also features 2 exterior zip front and 2 exterior zip back pockets for great versatility; internal zip pocket, too. Strap length adjusts from 27 - 51 in. and can be unclipped completely. Closeout.
short_description: Sporting a bold pattern, the women's Haiku Modern Flower Sling Bag can be slung over either shoulder while keeping your hands free as you shop or travel.
